Posts.EditableText: In Quest when you have been disconnected from a server through something like a command calling the disconnect <%userid%> tag, when using the "Quest" menu, then "Reconnect", Quest crashes with a runtime error 5.
Posts.HTML: In Quest when you have been disconnected from a server through something like a command calling the disconnect <%userid%> tag, when using the "Quest" menu, then "Reconnect", Quest crashes with a runtime error 5.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks for reporting this, I'll take a look into it.
Posts.HTML: Thanks for reporting this, I'll take a look into it.
